item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Derrick Jensen
item.description: "Within this culture wealth is measured by one's ability to consume and destroy." -- Derrick Jensen

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Derrick Jensen
item.description: "Those in power have made it so we have to pay simply to exist on the planet. We have to pay for a place to sleep, and we have to pay for food. If we don't, people with guns come and force us to pay. That's violent." -- Derrick Jensen

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Terence McKenna
item.description: "Only psychos and shamans create their own reality" -- Terence McKenna

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Theodor W. Adorno
item.description: "Dissonance is the truth about harmony." -- Theodor W. Adorno

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Theodor W. Adorno
item.description: "Auschwitz begins wherever someone looks at a slaughterhouse and thinks: they’re only animals." -- Theodor W. Adorno

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Theodor Adorno
item.description: "Intolerance of ambiguity is the mark of an authoritarian personality." -- Theodor Adorno

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Theodor Adorno
item.description: "Behind every work of art lies an uncommitted crime" -- Theodor Adorno

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Vandana Shiva
item.description: "In nature's economy the currency is not money, it is life." -- Vandana Shiva

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Vandana Shiva
item.description: "Gandhi is the other person. I believe Gandhi is the only person who knew about real democracy — not democracy as the right to go and buy what you want, but democracy as the responsibility to be accountable to everyone around you. Democracy begins with freedom from hunger, freedom from unemployment, freedom from fear, and freedom from hatred. To me, those are the real freedoms on the basis of which good human societies are based." -- Vandana Shiva

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Vandana Shiva
item.description: "You are not Atlas carrying the world on your shoulder. It is good to remember that the planet is carrying you." -- Vandana Shiva

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Ishmael Reed
item.description: "No one says a novel has to be one thing. It can be anything it wants to be, a vaudeville show, the six o’clock news, the mumblings of wild men saddled by demons." -- Ishmael Reed

item.title: Rodrigo add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "I don't fuck much with the past but I fuck plenty with the future." -- Patti Smith
